name: DungeonRun
description:
Dungeon Runner Description :

Dungeon Runner is  a pretty hard platform game inspired by prince of persia. You have to reach the 8th floor to finish the game.

It was made year ago (2017) and it was my first game.

Made with Construct 2

I hope you like it.

Ps : If you found a nice music or functionnality to add to this game, please tell me in the comment section.

Keys:

Left Arrow : Move left

Right Arrow : Move right

Up Arrow : Jump

Down Arrow : Load cannon (Boss)

R : Reload map
